name: El Viejo Continente - Special Edition - Edicion Esteli Box Press
additionalNotes:
In some industries, five years might not seem like a long time let alone cause for celebration. However, in the fast and furious world of premium cigars, being able to thrive and survive for one-half decade is a great accomplishment. To celebrate this major feat, Daniel Guerrero, cigar shop owner turned 
This anniversary premium cigar sports a dark Ecuadorian Habano maduro wrapper expertly placed over a Jalapa, Nicaragua binder and a filler composed of long-filler tobaccos from three of Nicaraguaâ€™s top-tobacco producing regions. The El Viejo Continente 5 Anos is a box-worthy cigar that is hand crafted in Nicaragua.
